column3: Would have to be overhauled once https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11200 goes in.\nMaybe instead of "Include", "exclude" the startup `-rescan`?
Not clear to me that #11200 fixes this from -cli?
Sorry.. Your right, wrong direction. The only nitpick would be if GUI Console commands are RPC commands.\n\nACK 8b2c7330d09fd9dee93b3f44881437b17766aea3
